channel.title: Client help
channel.description:
ok..everytime i want to run a client there appears this error... :mad:
Registry key 'Software\JavaSoft\Java Runtime Environment\CurrentVersion' has value '1.6', but '1.3' is required. Error: could not find java.dll Error: could not find Java 2 Runtime Environment. Press any key to continue . . .
also if u can help me to modify the client will be appreciated.. ;) things to do: 1.make client enter to MY server 2.change background

item.title: Client help
item.dc:creator: @VyperX VyperX
item.description:
@VyperX wrote:

ok…everytime i want to run a client there appears this error… :mad:

Registry key 'Software\JavaSoft\Java Runtime Environment\CurrentVersion' has value '1.6', but '1.3' is required. Error: could not find java.dll Error: could not find Java 2 Runtime Environment. Press any key to continue . . .

also if u can help me to modify the client will be appreciated…
things to do:
1.make client enter to MY server
2.change background
